SELECT SEQ_ART_POST.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_ART_POST (ID, ART_POST_DATE, ART_ID) VALUES (#{id}, #{artPostDate}, #{artId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.ART_POST_DATE, TBP.USER_ID, TBP.ART_ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TBA.ART_MATERIAL, TBA.ART_SIZE, TBA.ART_DESCRIPTION, TBC.ART_POST_ID TBA.ART_END_DATE, TBA.USER_ID, TBU.USER_NAME, TBC.COMMENT_CONTENT, TBC.COMMENT_DATE, TBCL.COMMENT_ID, TBCL.USER_ID, TBCL.COMMENT_LIKE_TIME FROM TBL_ART_POST TBP JOIN TBL_ART TBA ON TBP.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBP.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT TBC ON TBP.ID = TBC.ART_POST_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT_LIKE TBCL ON TBC.ID = TBCL.COMMENT_ID

SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.ART_POST_DATE, TBP.ART_ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TBA.ART_MATERIAL, TBA.ART_SIZE, TBA.ART_DESCRIPTION, TBA.ART_END_DATE, TBA.USER_ID, TBU.USER_NAME, TBU.USER_EMAIL, TBU.USER_IMG_NAME, TBU.USER_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART_POST TBP JOIN TBL_ART TBA ON TBP.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBA.USER_ID = TBU.ID WHERE TBP.ID = #{id}

SELECT TBA.ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TBU.USER_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TBP.ID AS ART_POST_ID FROM TBL_ART TBA JOIN TBL_ART_POST TBP ON TBA.ID = TBP.ART_ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBA.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAI1.ART_ID, TAI1.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI1.ART_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART_IMG TAI1 JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS MIN_ID FROM TBL_ART_IMG GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAI2 ON TAI1.ART_ID = TAI2.ART_ID AND TAI1.ID = TAI2.MIN_ID ) TAI ON TBA.ID = TAI.ART_ID WHERE TBA.ART_STATUS = '승인완료' ORDER BY TBP.ART_POST_DATE DESC FETCH NEXT 50 ROWS ONLY

SELECT TBA.ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TBA.ART_MATERIAL, TBA.ART_SIZE, TBA.ART_DESCRIPTION, TBA.ART_END_DATE, TBA.USER_ID, TBP.ART_POST_DATE, TBU.USER_NAME AS ARTIST_NAME, COALESCE(TAL.ART_LIKE_COUNT, 0) AS ART_LIKE_COUNT, COALESCE(TBC.COMMENT_COUNT, 0) AS COMMENT_COUNT, TBU.ID AS ARTIST_ID, TBC.ART_POST_ID, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH, TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TBP.ART_ID, TBP.ID AS artPostId FROM TBL_ART TBA JOIN TBL_ART_POST TBP ON TBA.ID = TBP.ART_ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBA.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, COUNT(ID) AS ART_LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_ART_LIKE GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAL ON TBA.ID = TAL.ART_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ART_POST_ID, COUNT(ID) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM TBL_COMMENT GROUP BY ART_POST_ID ) TBC ON TBP.ID = TBC.ART_POST_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAI1.ART_ID, TAI1.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI1.ART_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART_IMG TAI1 JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS MIN_ID FROM TBL_ART_IMG GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAI2 ON TAI1.ART_ID = TAI2.ART_ID AND TAI1.ID = TAI2.MIN_ID ) TAI ON TBA.ID = TAI.ART_ID WHERE TBA.ART_STATUS = '승인완료' AND
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '공예'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '건축'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '서예'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '회화'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '조각'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '한국화'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '한국화'
AND ( TBA.ART_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')) OR TBU.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')) )
ORDER BY ART_LIKE_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY COMMENT_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY TBP.ART_POST_DATE DESC
ORDER BY TBA.ID DESC
OFFSET (#{cursor} - 1) * 15 ROWS FETCH NEXT 15 ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(TBP.ID) FROM TBL_ART_POST TBP JOIN TBL_ART TBA ON TBP.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBA.USER_ID = TBU.ID WHERE
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '공예'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '건축'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '서예'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '회화'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '조각'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '한국화'
TBA.ART_CATEGORY = '한국화'
AND ( TBA.ART_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')) OR TBU.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')) )

SELECT TBA.ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBU.USER_NAME, TBA.ART_STATUS, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, NVL(TAL.ART_LIKE_COUNT, 0) AS ART_LIKE_COUNT, TAP.ID AS ART_POST_ID FROM TBL_ART TBA JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBA.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAI1.ART_ID, TAI1.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI1.ART_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART_IMG TAI1 JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS MIN_ID FROM TBL_ART_IMG GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAI2 ON TAI1.ART_ID = TAI2.ART_ID AND TAI1.ID = TAI2.MIN_ID ) TAI ON TBA.ID = TAI.ART_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, COUNT(*) AS ART_LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_ART_LIKE GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAL ON TAL.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS ID FROM TBL_ART_POST GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAP ON TAP.ART_ID = TBA.ID WHERE TBA.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT TBA.ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBU.USER_NAME, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TAP.ID AS ART_POST_ID FROM TBL_ART TBA JOIN TBL_ART_LIKE TBLU ON TBA.ID = TBLU.ART_ID AND TBLU.USER_ID = #{userId} JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBA.USER_ID = TBU.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, COUNT(ID) AS ART_LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_ART_LIKE GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAL ON TBA.ID = TAL.ART_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAI1.ART_ID, TAI1.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI1.ART_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART_IMG TAI1 JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS MIN_ID FROM TBL_ART_IMG GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAI2 ON TAI1.ART_ID = TAI2.ART_ID AND TAI1.ID = TAI2.MIN_ID ) TAI ON TBA.ID = TAI.ART_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_ART_POST TAP ON TAP.ART_ID = TBA.ID

SELECT TBA.ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, COALESCE(TAL.LIKE_COUNT, 0) AS artLikeCount, TAI.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TAP.ID AS ART_POST_ID FROM TBL_ART TBA JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS ID FROM TBL_ART_POST GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAP ON TAP.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, COUNT(ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM TBL_ART_LIKE GROUP BY ART_ID HAVING COUNT(ID) >= 50 ) TAL ON TBA.ID = TAL.ART_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TAI1.ART_ID, TAI1.ART_IMG_NAME, TAI1.ART_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ART_IMG TAI1 JOIN ( SELECT ART_ID, MIN(ID) AS MIN_ID FROM TBL_ART_IMG GROUP BY ART_ID ) TAI2 ON TAI1.ART_ID = TAI2.ART_ID AND TAI1.ID = TAI2.MIN_ID ) TAI ON TBA.ID = TAI.ART_ID WHERE TBA.USER_ID = #{userId}
